briefTitle: A Study to Evaluate the Efficacy and Safety of ABT-493/ABT-530 in Renally Impaired Adults With Chronic Hepatitis C Virus Genotype 1 - 6 Infection
officialTitle: A Single-Arm, Open-Label, Study to Evaluate the Efficacy and Safety of ABT-493/ABT-530 in Renally-Impaired Adults With Chronic Hepatitis C Virus Genotype 1 - 6 Infection (EXPEDITION-4)
summary: The purpose of this study is to assess the efficacy and safety of 12 weeks of treatment with the ABT-493/ABT-530 combination regimen in adults with chronic HCV genotype 1 - 6 infection and chronic severe renal impairment.

primaryOutcome.measure: Percentage of Participants With Sustained Virologic Response 12 Weeks Post-treatment (SVR12)
primaryOutcome.timeFrame: 12 weeks after the last actual dose of study drug
